resources.string: By clicking \"OK\" you will cancel the import process
You have cancelled the import. If you didn\'t mean to try again.
You cannot delete this item as it has been edited outside this application.
Please choose the appropriate calculator to calculate ^
There was a problem with your request. You will be redirected back to the home screen.
An application requires an update to the Android Wear app.
This app won\'t run unless you update the Android Wear app.
This app won\'t work unless you enable Google Play services.
This app won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your phone.
This app won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your tablet.
The specified account does not exist on this device. Please choose a different account.
An application requires Google Play services to be enabled.
A data connection is required to connect to Google Play services.
An application requires installation of Google Play services.
An application requires an update for Google Play services.
Error signing in the specified account. Please choose a different account.
Unknown issue with Google Play services.
Google Play services, which some of your applications rely on, is not supported by your device. Please contact the manufacturer for assistance.
This app won\'t run unless you update Google Play services.
This app requires one or more Google Play services that are not currently available. Please contact the developer for assistance.
You are about to cancel your changes. Is this OK?
Allow Ad to create a calendar event?
Please select a date end that is after the start date.
You have calendar events associated with this list. Do you want to delete these events?
By clicking \"Ok\" you will permanently delete the item.
If you enter a description it must be at least 3 characters.
Editing this event outside of this application can cause adverse effects.
End Date should be later than Start Date
There were errors importing this item. Please click to fix.
There were some errors when importing your list. You can fix the errors or remove the items with errors from the list
There were some errors importing. None of the sheets were imported.Please fix the issues and try again.
There was an error loading the list. Please try again
The end date should be later than the start date
Please enter a name with a minimum of 3 characters.
An external application has removed this event from your calendar.
Click to hide this dialog next time.
Do you want to replace or delete image?
You must take a photo in order to save.
There was an error reading the file. This can sometimes happen if the file is corrupt or has the incorrect file extension.

HoneyDew It supports importing data from either an .xls,.xlsx, .txt or .csv file. Just open the file on your phone and click the HoneyDewIt icon. The first row in all files must have an \"item\" header. There is also an option to add the following: \"quantity\", \"description\", \"discount\", \"unit\" type, as well as \"price\" per item. If you do not supply a quantity then a default quantity of 1 will be set. If using a .txt or .csv file please separate values by a \^. If you are importing from an .xls or .xlsx file then you have the ability to create separate lists for each sheet in the workbook. Please look at the images below for a sample of all files.
Please enter a valid number for discount.
A list already exists with the name ?. Please try a different name.
A list named \"^\" already exists. Please rename the file or replace the existing.
Please enter a name with a minimum of 3 characters.
You have not selected any Sheets. If this was in error please try again
Please enter a valid quantity greater than 0.
To add repeat events please open event in standard calendar app.
You are about to leave the current screen. Do you want to save?
You must make a selection to continue.
"Allow Ad to store image in Picture gallery?"
Clicking "Cancel" will cancel the selection of the sheet.
Unfortunately there was an unexpected error. Click "Send Report" to send an error report to AJB Technologies. Click on "Home" to be taken to HoneyDew-It home screen.

string.name: wallet_buy_button_place_holder
string.translation_description: Text on a button that allows a user to make a payment with Google Wallet [CHAR LIMIT=30]
